00030 CStyle::CStyle() {
00031     m_headerFormat = new CStyleFormat();
00032     m_moduleTextFormat = new CStyleFormat();
00033     m_descriptionFormat = new CStyleFormat();
00034     m_listViewItem = 0;
00035     m_isHeaderFormatEnabled = m_isDescriptionFormatEnabled = m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled = true;
00036     
00037     setStyleName( i18n("unknown name") );
00038 }
00039 
00040 CStyle::~CStyle(){
00041     if (m_headerFormat)
00042         delete m_headerFormat;
00043     if (m_moduleTextFormat)
00044         delete m_moduleTextFormat;
00045     if (m_descriptionFormat)        
00046         delete m_descriptionFormat;
00047 }
00048 
00050 CStyleFormat* CStyle::formatForType( const CStyle::styleType type) const {
00051     switch (type) {
00052         case Header:
00053             return m_headerFormat;
00054         case ModuleText:
00055             return m_moduleTextFormat;
00056         case Description:
00057             return m_descriptionFormat;
00058         default:
00059             return 0;
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00064 void CStyle::setFormatForType( const CStyle::styleType type, CStyleFormat* format){
00065     switch (type) {
00066         case Header:
00067             m_headerFormat = format;
00068             break;
00069         case ModuleText:
00070             m_moduleTextFormat = format;
00071             break;
00072         case Description:
00073             m_descriptionFormat = format;
00074             break;
00075         default:
00076             break;
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00081 const bool CStyle::hasFormatTypeEnabled( const CStyle::styleType type) const {  
00082 //  qWarning("CStyle::hasFormatTypeEnabled( const CStyle::styleType type)");
00083     switch (type) {
00084         case Header:
00085             return m_isHeaderFormatEnabled;
00086         case ModuleText:
00087             return m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled;
00088         case Description:
00089             return m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled;     
00090         default:
00091             return false;
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00096 void CStyle::setFormatTypeEnabled( const CStyle::styleType type, const bool setEnabled) {
00097     switch (type) {
00098         case Header:
00099             m_isHeaderFormatEnabled = setEnabled;
00100             break;
00101         case ModuleText:
00102             m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled = setEnabled;       
00103             break;
00104         case Description:
00105             m_isDescriptionFormatEnabled = setEnabled;      
00106             break;
00107         default:
00108             break;
00109     }
00110 }
00111 
00113 QListViewItem* CStyle::listViewItem( CStyleList* list ){
00114     if (!list) {
00115         if (!m_listViewItem)
00116             return 0;
00117         else
00118             return m_listViewItem;
00119     }
00120     deleteListViewItem();
00121     m_listViewItem = new QListViewItem( list );
00122     updateListViewItem();   
00123     return m_listViewItem;
00124 }
00125 
00127 const QString& CStyle::styleName() const{
00128     return m_styleName;
00129 }
00130 
00132 void CStyle::setStyleName( const QString name ){
00133 //  qDebug("CStyle::setStyleName( const QString name)");
00134     m_styleName = name;
00135 }
00136 
00138 void CStyle::clearData(){
00139 //  qDebug("CStyle::clearData()");
00140     deleteListViewItem();
00141     m_styleName = QString::null;
00142     m_isDescriptionFormatEnabled = m_isHeaderFormatEnabled = m_isModuleTextFormatEnabled = true;        
00143 }
00144 
00146 void CStyle::updateListViewItem(){
00147     m_listViewItem->setText(0, styleName() );
00148 }
00149 
00151 void CStyle::deleteListViewItem(){
00152 //  if (m_listViewItem) {
00153         delete m_listViewItem;
00154 //  }
00155     m_listViewItem = 0;
00156 }
